The Story Behind Black Opium

Launched in 2014, YSL Black Opium was created to embody the edgy, rock 'n' roll spirit of the modern YSL woman. As a flanker to the classic Opium fragrance from 1977, Black Opium represents a contemporary reinterpretation that speaks to a new generation. The perfumers Nathalie Lorson, Marie Salamagne, Olivier Cresp, and Honorine Blanc collaborated to create this oriental fragrance masterpiece that has since become one of the most recognizable and beloved gourmand fragrances in modern perfumery. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question: How long does Black Opium last on skin?

Black Opium EDP offers impressive longevity, typically lasting 7-9 hours on most skin types. The coffee and vanilla base notes act as natural fixatives, helping the fragrance maintain its presence throughout the day or evening. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and consider layering with the matching body lotion from the Black Opium collection.
